name: ERA a.s.
goal: ERA a.s is a leading company in multilateration, multistatic surveillance, and reconnaissance technology. unrivalled experience in passive surveillance sensor development provides ERA with unique know-how to deliver comprehensive solutions for air traffic control and management global markets. We develop, manufacture and implement mission-critical systems for military and civil purposes. Over last 2 decades, ERA has reached number of more than 100 installations with 24/7 operations fulfilling demanding customer requirements
euInitiatives:
Active participation and contribution to Eurocontrol, EUROCAE, EASA, EDA working groups/standards.
Specifically:

EUROCAE WG-41 A-SMGCS
The deliverables of WG-41 are part of the requirements of the Pilot Common Project PCP, Commission Implementing Regulation (EU) No IR 716/2014.

EUROCAE WG-51 Automatic Dependent Surveillance-Broadcast (ADS-B) together with subgroups
- 1090 MHz Extended Squitter MOPS and maintenance thereof (SG-1);
- SPR documents for ADS-B airborne and ground surveillance applications as well as aircraft system MOPS (and possibly MASPS) material (SG-3);
-Technical Specifications for ADS-B and Wide Area Multilateration (WAM) composite surveillance Systems (SG-4).
WG-51 works in coordination with RTCA SC-186. Furthermore, WG-51 is part of the Combined Surveillance Committee with WG-49 and RTCA SC-209.

EUROCAE WG-102 GEN-SUR SPR
Tasked to specify generic surveillance safety and performance requirements for ATC purposes.

EUROCAE WG-103 Independent Non-Cooperative Surveillance
The group will develop a system-agnostic Technical Specification for non-cooperative surveillance sensors.

EUROCAE WG-105 Unmanned Aircraft Systems (UAS)
Tasked to develop standards and guidance documents that will allow the safe operation of UAS in all types of airspace, at all times and for all types of operations.

EUROCONTROL Surveillance Modernisation Support Group (SMSG)
Group provides a forum to support the performance-based modernization and rationalization of Surveillance infrastructure and applications in Europe, including the implementation of ADS-B Out, initial ADS-B In and Wide Area Multilateration (WAM).

EUROCONTROL other event-driven activities related with ERA company branch (eg. new ASTERIX category definition, conferences, consultations etc.)

EASA relationships are event-driven based on company presence in ATC/ATM environment tightly related to Eurocontrol and EUROCAE activities.
